resources.string: Enter Name for the High Scores List

1. Try to memorize the 4 highlighted tiles that appear on the grid for 3 seconds.
 2. You will then try to select the same tiles that were highlighted within 5 seconds.
 3. If you select any incorrect tiles or the time runs out, the game will end.
 4. If you select the correct tiles, you will move on to the next level and gain 10 points.
 5. After 3 successful rounds, you need to select 5 tiles and will gain 20 points.
 6. Keep going for as long as you can.
